name: Fires of U'Zhul
description: A fiery ball leaps from the wizard's hands. Range 18", one S4 hit with normal armour saves.

name: Flight of Zimmeran
description: The wizard may move up to 12" including into combat (counts as charging). Scores automatic hits on fleeing enemies.

name: Dread of Aramar
description: A single model within 12" must pass a Leadership test or flee 2D6" away, continuing to flee until passing a test. No effect on Undead.

name: Silver Arrows of Arha
description: D6+2 arrows using the wizard's BS, no penalties. Range 24", each causes one S3 hit. Cannot be cast in combat.

name: Luck of Shemtek
description: The wizard may re-roll all his failed dice rolls until the beginning of his next turn.

name: Sword of Rezhebel
description: A magical blade grants +1 Attack, +2 Strength, and +2 Weapon Skill. Requires Leadership test each turn to maintain.

name: Doombolt
description: A bolt of dark energy travels up to 18", inflicting S5 damage and potentially leaping to nearby targets with decreasing power.

name: Word of Pain
description: Curses a nearby enemy within 12", forcing them to re-roll successful attacks and wound rolls, plus requiring a Leadership test to charge. Lasts until caster's next turn.

name: Soul Stealer
description: Through touch, the essence of life is drained from her enemy, wounding them without armour protection while granting the caster one extra wound for the battle.

name: Flamesword
description: Engulfs an ally's weapon within 6" in dark flames, adding +2 Strength and making hits ignore armour saves until caster's next shooting phase.

name: Deathspasm
description: Inflicts excruciating pain on the closest enemy within 6", forcing an injury roll. The caster is immediately knocked down afterward.

name: Witch Flight
description: The caster flies through the air and moves anywhere within 12", potentially charging and gaining automatic hits against fleeing enemies.

name: Vision of Torment
description: Summons horrible visions of the realm of Chaos. Stuns or knocks down target within 6".

name: Eye of God
description: Implores the Dark gods to grant a boon. Once per battle; grants characteristic bonus to any model within 6".

name: Dark Blood
description: The caster cuts his palm and blood spurts out burning flesh and armour. Deals D3 S5 hits at 8" range; caster takes injury.

name: Lure of Chaos
description: Calls upon the taint of chaos in the soul of all living beings. Takes control of closest enemy within 12" via leadership contest.

name: Wings of Darkness
description: Lifted from the ground by two shadowy Daemons. Teleports caster up to 12", can charge enemies.

name: Word of Pain
description: Speaking the forbidden name of his dark god causes indescribable pain. All models within 3" suffer S3 hit; no armour saves.

name: Scry
description: One hero or henchman may re-roll D3 dice rolls and add +1 or -1 to the result during the turn.

name: Curse
description: Forces one enemy within 12" to re-roll all successful dice for this and their next turn.

name: Dust of the Blind
description: Blinds one enemy within 16", preventing shooting/charging/running, halving WS, and forcing random movement until Witch casts another spell or moves.

name: Age of Stone
description: Reduces all characteristics by -1 for one enemy within 12" for this and their next turn.

name: Warrior's Bane
description: One enemy within 18" loses weapon use, cannot shoot, and fights with fists for this and their next turn.

name: Cure
description: Heals one wound for all friendly models within 6"; stunned/knocked down models may immediately stand.

name: Lifestealer
description: The Necromancer sucks out the very essence of life from his victim within 6", stealing its vigour. Inflicts a wound and grants the caster an extra wound.

name: Re-Animation
description: At the spoken command of the Necromancer, the dead rise to fight again. One Zombie that went out of action immediately returns within 6".

name: Death Vision
description: The Necromancer calls on the power of Necromancy to reveal the moment of his enemies' death. Grants the caster the fear ability for the battle.

name: Spell of Doom
description: The Necromancer whispers to the sleeping dead. Forces an enemy within 12" to pass a Strength test or suffer injury.

name: Call of Vanhel
description: Summons the world of the dead to invigorate Undead servants. A nearby Zombie or Dire Wolf may move again up to its full distance.

name: Spell of Awakening
description: Calls the soul of a slain Hero back to his body and enslaves him with corrupt magic. Converts a defeated enemy Hero into a Zombie servant.

name: The Hammer of Sigmar
description: This weapon of the faithful glows with golden light. Grants +2 Strength and double damage in melee.

name: Hearts of Steel
description: Allied warriors within 8" become immune to fear and alone tests; whole warband gains +1 to Rout tests. Lasts until caster is knocked down or stunned.

name: Soulfire
description: All enemy models within 4" suffer a S3 hit. Undead and Possessed models take S5 instead. No armour saves allowed.

name: Shield of Faith
description: The Priest is immune to all spells. Persists until a recovery phase roll of 1-2 occurs.

name: Healing Hand
description: Restores one nearby model to full health within 2". Stunned or knocked down allies within 2" stand and resume fighting.

name: Armour of Righteousness
description: Priest gains 2+ armour save and causes fear in enemies. Lasts until the priest's next shooting phase.

name: Snow Squall
description: All enemy models in hand-to-hand combat with the priest are at -1 to hit due to swirling snow effects lasting through combat.

name: Hammerschlag
description: Summons an ethereal hammer strike dealing S4 damage with concussion against a target within 6".

name: Bloodlust
description: Grants the priest +2 Strength on all attacks and critical hits on 5-6; must be maintained each turn with difficulty tests.

name: Wolf's Hunger
description: One warband member (priest's choice) enters a frenzied state.

name: Ulric's Howl
description: Warband gains immunity to Fear and isolation tests; Rout tests receive +1 bonus for the entire battle.

name: Call of Ulric
description: Priest transforms into a wolf form with M6 WS4 S4 T4 W1 I5 A2 Ld6; can only attack and must make Leadership tests to revert.

name: Stag's Leap
description: The priest moves up to 9" and gains +1 Strength on initial attacks if charging. Scores one automatic hit at +1 Strength against fleeing enemies.

name: Blessed Ale
description: Restores a model within 2" to full Wounds. Enemy living models within 2" lose 1 Attack next round due to ale fumes.

name: Bear's Paw
description: Grants the priest or a friendly model within 6" a +2 Strength bonus until the priest's next turn.

name: Earthshudder
description: Targets a building within 4", dealing S3 hits to adjacent enemies. The building collapses, causing falling damage to models on it.

name: Tanglefoot
description: All models within 12" move at half speed until next shooting phase. Excludes Ostlander Jaeger and friendly Horned Hunter Zealots.

name: Summon Squirrels
description: Dozens of enraged squirrels assault one enemy within 12", dealing 2D6 S1 hits with no armour saves.

name: Wind of Gork
description: A blast of foul flatulence signals Gork's Wrath. Knocks down first target in 12" range.

name: Gaze of Mork
description: Invokes the presence of the God Mork. Delivers D3 S3 hits to first model in 12" range.

name: 'Eadbanger
description: Channels Waaagh energy as fire bolts equal to Shaman's base Attacks at 6" range. Shaman collapses on a roll of 1.

name: Leap of Waaagh!
description: The Shaman summons a giant green hand to move any Goblin up to 12", ignoring terrain.

name: Idol of Gork
description: Grants Shaman +1 WS, +1 S, and +1 A until wounded.

name: 'Ere we go!
description: Friendly models within 6" treat stunned results as knocked down instead until Shaman takes a wound.

name: Led'z go
description: The Shaman's howling invigorates the ladz. Orcs and Goblins within 4" strike first in combat until the caster is knocked down or stunned.

name: Oi! Gerroff!
description: A huge green ectoplasmic hand pushes an enemy D6" away at 8" range; collisions cause damage. Cannot target models in melee.

name: Zzap!
description: A crackling green bolt of WAAAGH! energy erupts from the Shaman's forehead. D3 S4 hits on closest enemy at 12" range, no armour saves.

name: Fooled Ya!
description: The Shaman disappears in a green mist. Prevents enemy charges next turn; allows 4" retreat if engaged in melee.

name: Clubba
description: A huge green club appears in the hand of the Shaman. Grants +2 Strength and +1 attack; ends when Shaman suffers a wound.

name: Fire of Gork
description: Twin green flame bolts strike enemies at 12" range, each dealing D3 S3 hits; can target one or two enemies.

name: Riding the Wind
description: The caster rises up on a warm breeze, moving 12+D6" to another part of the battlefield.

name: Skin of Stone
description: Grants a warrior +2 armour save but -1 Initiative; requires maintenance within 6" each turn.

name: Burning Hand
description: One of the caster's hands becomes a burning bolt dealing S5 damage (2 wounds); may ignite target on 4+.

name: Quicksand
description: Creates water effect across 3" radius around target; warriors must pass Strength test to move or attack.

name: Storm of Magic
description: Targets warrior within 12" with magical bolt dealing one S5 hit with normal armour saves.

name: Blessing of the Elements
description: Allows re-rolling one die or modifying one result by +/-1 during post-battle sequence.

name: Divination of Shirath
description: The Mage may re-roll all his failed dice rolls, though the second result stands. Lasts until the Mage's next turn.

name: Shimmering Shield
description: Grants the caster an additional unmodified 5+ save against all attacks. Continues until the Mage's next turn.

name: Statue of Light
description: Immobilizes a chosen enemy. Both may cast spells, but close combat occurs at -2 WS. Lasts while the Mage remains alive and stationary.

name: Fleeting Shadows
description: The first time the Mage is hit in close combat or shooting, the spell protects him and the hit is ignored. Caster shifts 2" in random direction.

name: Hunter's Fury
description: Summons D3+1 magical projectiles dealing S3 hits each, with 36" range. Uses the caster's BS without penalties.

name: Silent Guardian
description: Glowing swords appear to defend the Mage. Guardian fights first with WS5, S3, making one attack per attacker.

name: Singing Wind
description: The goddess appears as singing motes and dancing lights that entrance and hold any model within 10" until start of next turn. Cannot move, shoot, or cast but may defend.

name: Serpent's Strength
description: Grants +1 Strength to all friendly models within 8" of the Priestess until end of her next turn.

name: Wendala's Maelstrom
description: Creates a protective storm extending 18", imposing -1 penalty to enemy missile weapon attacks until start of next turn.

name: Shield of Thorns
description: Produces a cocoon of thorns making the Priestess immune to ranged and magical attacks. Negates strikes in first round of combat.

name: The Living Jungle
description: Targets one model within 12", inflicting 1D6 S2 hits with no armour saves except Ward saves.

name: Siren's Dreams
description: A beautiful mesmerising song distracts enemies within 12", imposing -1 to opposing warband Leadership tests until end of next turn. Lizardmen and Undead immune.

name: Spectre of Hashut
description: A spectral apparition of the god Hashut hits the closest miniature within 10". The target is automatically stunned.

name: Stone Statue
description: Enemy within 12" becomes immobilized for current and following turn. Takes automatic melee hits and grants +1 to shooter accuracy.

name: Fireball
description: Ranged spell (16" range, line of sight required) dealing automatic S4 hit to target.

name: Vanish
description: The sorcerer vanishes and reappears elsewhere on the battlefield. Grants 6" movement without combat penalties.

name: Eruption
description: All miniatures within 4" suffer automatic S4 hit. Caster cannot cast spells next turn and suffers -1 Toughness.

name: Eye of Hashut
description: Buff spell targeting friendly unit within 12". D6 determines outcome: failure removes unit, success adds +1 to one attribute, critical adds +1 to all.

name: Wind of Gork
description: A blast of foul flatulence signals Gork's wrath. Targets within 12" must pass a Toughness roll or take S2 damage and fall.

name: Gaze of Mork
description: The Shaman invokes the presence of the God Mork to smite foes with lightning. Deals D3 S3 hits at 12" range.

name: 'Eadbanger
description: Shaman unleashes Waaagh energy within 6" range, firing bolts equal to attack count. Rolling a 1 causes shaman to collapse.

name: Leap of Waaagh!
description: The Shaman summons a giant green hand to lift any Goblin and carry him into the fray. Moves target up to 12" and grants charge.

name: Idol of Gork
description: Shaman gains +1 WS, +1 S, and +1 A until wounded.

name: 'Ere we go
description: Friendly models within 6" treat stunned results as knocked down instead until shaman takes a wound.

name: Morr's Protection
description: Negates any magical attacks made by a Necromancer, a Magister or Daemons directed at the priest.

name: Death Holds No Fear
description: Makes the priest of Morr fearless for the remainder of the game.

name: Sanctity of the Fallen
description: Sanctifies fallen models within 6", preventing them from being raised by Necromancers.

name: Hand of Morr
description: Instantly removes Undead from action when priest is in base contact; causes Ghouls/Possessed to flee.

name: Do you know who I am?
description: Stuns the closest Undead model within 6" range; knocks down if stunning is impossible.

name: I am death!
description: Grants 6+ armour save and increases WS by +1 or to 4, whichever is greater.

name: Lady's Favors
description: All your heroes count as having Lucky Charms for this battle and ignore the first hit against them on a D6 roll of 4+.

name: Blessed Protection
description: Grants an unmodified ward save of 4+ against spell and prayer effects to the Damsel and nearby Bretonnians within 6".

name: Swiftstride
description: Allows a friendly hero or henchman within 12" to gain +1 to hit and make an additional 1D6" move towards enemies.

name: Lady's Scorn
description: Anyone attempting to shoot at the Damsel must first pass a Leadership test, or they are unable to fire. Lasts until end of game.

name: Elixir of Life
description: Restores a model within 4" to full wounds and allows stunned/knocked down nearby allies to stand and continue fighting.

name: Guiding Vision
description: That warrior may re-roll one die roll they make and add +1 or -1 to the result until next shooting phase.

name: Chotec's Wrath
description: A lightning bolt shoots from the sky and strikes the closest enemy within 10" causing S5 damage, with bonuses against armoured targets.

name: Sotec's Blessing
description: Grants a single nearby model one random benefit: combat bonuses, toughness increase, or enhanced movement/initiative.

name: Huanchi's Stealth
description: Allows any model that is in cover to immediately go into hiding, even after moving or shooting.

name: The Old Ones' Protection
description: The Skink Priest and nearby Lizardmen gain a 4+ save against spell effects until the caster is defeated.

name: Tinci's Rage
description: A target model enters frenzy and gains +1 Strength, requiring leadership checks to maintain the effect.

name: Itzl's Speed
description: A Lizardman model may make an additional sprint of movement and move up to 4", functioning as running movement.

name: Bolt of Dark Light
description: A bolt of malign power to smite his enemies with 12" range, dealing one S5 hit.

name: Betrayal in Death
description: Reanimates slain enemy models to attack their allies once before falling again.

name: Nightmare
description: Targets enemy within 18", forcing a fear test; failure causes 2D6" retreat.

name: Curse of the Dark Master
description: Single model within 24" suffers -1 penalty to all hit rolls until caster's next turn.

name: Fog of Death
description: Deep and impenetrable fog cloaks the entire battlefield; all models take S2 hits; reduces sight to 3D6".

name: Coils of the Serpent
description: Single enemy within 6" must pass toughness test or is crushed to death; no saves applicable.

name: Wings of Fate
description: A flock of birds sweep down and attack enemies within 18", dealing D3 S2 hits.

name: Light of Battle
description: Grants a friendly model within 12" an additional 5+ save against all attacks until the caster's next turn.

name: Gift of Life
description: Restores a friendly model slain in the previous enemy turn back to 1 wound at its original location.

name: Blessing of Valour
description: Grants a single friendly model within 24" a +1 bonus to hit rolls in close combat for the turn.

name: Boon of Courage
description: Makes all friendly models within 12" completely immune to the effects of psychology until the caster's next turn.

name: Voice of Command
description: Prevents one enemy model within 24" from moving, shooting, or attacking next turn; may only defend in combat.

name: Warpfire
description: A green flame leaps from the outstretched paw of the Sorcerer. Deals D3 S4 hits plus splash damage.

name: Children of the Horned Rat
description: Pre-battle summoning spell that calls forth D3 Giant Rats within 6" of the caster. Can only be cast once per battle.

name: Gnawdoom
description: The target is attacked by rats and covered in small bleeding wounds. Inflicts 2D6 S1 hits on a single model within 8".

name: Black Fury
description: Transforms the Sorcerer into a rat creature allowing an immediate charge up to 12", granting +2 Attacks and +1 Strength during combat.

name: Eye of the Warp
description: Gaze into the eye of the warp and despair! Forces models in base contact to make Leadership tests or suffer S3 hits and flee.

name: Sorcerer's Curse
description: Targets a single enemy within 12", forcing them to re-roll successful armour saves and to-hit rolls through both players' next combat phases.

name: Menkare's Scroll of Urgency
description: A single Skeleton Soldier within 6" may immediately move again up to its maximum Movement distance.

name: Horrebe's Curse of the Mummy
description: Inflicts -1 penalty on hit, wound, and armour save rolls for target in base contact with Mummy.

name: Tawosret's Scroll of Tomb Dust
description: The warrior is automatically knocked down as he chokes on the sand. Only affects living models.

name: Neferre's Scroll of Quaking Horror
description: Target must pass Leadership test or flee 2D6" away; continues fleeing until rallied.

name: Merneptah's Scroll of the Scarab Song
description: Target within 8" suffers 2D6 S1 hits and cannot be shot at or fight in combat.

name: Djedre's Summonation of the Vengeful Dead
description: Re-animate a Skeleton Soldier that went out of action during the last turn within 6".

name: Spell of Awakening
description: Calls the soul of a slain Hero back to his body to serve as a Zombie with retained stats but no skills.

name: Lifestealer
description: Sorcerer drains a model within 6" of one wound, gaining an extra wound for the battle. Undead unaffected.

name: Reanimation
description: Returns one recently defeated Zombie to battle within 6", or restores 1 wound to Grave Guards/Wights.

name: Spell of Doom
description: Target enemy within 12" must roll equal to or less than their Strength on D6 or suffer an injury.

name: Call of Vanhel
description: One undead model within 6" gains an additional movement phase and automatically passes Initiative tests.

name: Deathly Visage
description: Necromancers only. Causes fear in enemies and grants immunity to fear for the battle.

name: Living Horror
description: Liche only. Targets model within 8"; roll D6+3 vs Leadership; if successful, inflicts a wound and prevents actions next turn.

name: Howl of the North
description: Icy winds sweep before the Shaman knocking missiles from their path. Grants missile immunity; winds dissipate on 1-2.

name: Angvar's Fury
description: The Shaman's howls rouse the anger of the warriors around him. Grants +1 to hit in melee within 8" until next turn.

name: Elvek's Cold Spear
description: A razor sharp icicle flies at the Shaman's foe. 18" range projectile dealing S4 damage with normal armour saves.

name: Gift of the Fates
description: The Shaman calls on the three Wyrd Sisters for a glimpse of the future. Allows adjusting one die roll by +/-1 before next recovery phase.

name: Kiss of Frost
description: The Shaman covers ground with slick ice. Target within 12" must pass Initiative test or become knocked down.

name: Bear's Might
description: Calls upon spirits of great Ice Bears. Grants +1 A, +2 S, +2 T, -2 I; requires Leadership test each turn to maintain.

name: Daemonic Vigour
description: Imbues Daemonic minions with supernatural power, improving Plague Bearers and Nurglings' saves within 8".

name: Buboes
description: Inflicts a wound on a single enemy within 8" if they fail a Toughness test; no armour protection applies.

name: Stench of Nurgle
description: Releases a noxious mist within 6" that forces all living creatures to test or lose an Attack.

name: Pestilence
description: Inflicts horrible diseases upon the unbelievers, dealing S3 damage to all enemies within 12".

name: Scabrous Hide
description: Grants the Master a 2+ armour save that lasts until the next Shooting phase.

name: Nurgle's Rot
description: Forces enemies in base contact to test or contract Nurgle's Rot disease.

name: Touch of Onogal
description: The Seer's body is covered with smallpox and blisters. His touch can transmit devastating diseases in melee combat.

name: Buboes
description: The Master bestows the gift of pus-filled buboes upon his enemies. Single enemy within 8" must pass Toughness test or lose a Wound.

name: Stench of Nurgle
description: The Master spews forth a foul stinking mist. Affects all creatures within 6"; enemies lose an Attack until next turn.

name: Pestilence
description: The Master inflicts horrible diseases upon the unbelievers. S3 hit against all enemy models within 12".

name: Scabrous Hide
description: The Master's skin becomes tough and leathery. Grants 2+ armour save until next Shooting phase.

name: Nurgle's Rot
description: The Master bestows the blessing of the Plague God upon his foe. Enemies in base contact must test Toughness or contract Nurgle's Rot.

name: Sacrificial Ritual
description: The Chaos Dwarf Sorcerer sacrifices captives in a bloody ritual to gain experience, requiring contact with an Engine of Chaos.

name: Spirit of Hashut
description: Creates a ghostly bull-god avatar that tramples enemies along an 18" line, inflicting S4 hits.

name: Bellow of Doom
description: Forces enemies in base contact with the sorcerer to make a Leadership test or flee combat.

name: Fumes of Azgorh
description: Releases corrosive smoke in an 8" range that deals S4 hits (4+ to hit) with no armour saves.

name: Flickering Hide
description: Applied to self or nearby model; negates wounds on 4+ and reflects S3 hits back to attackers.

name: Lava Flow
description: Allows the sorcerer to move 12" and charge, traveling through ground to reappear elsewhere.

name: Earthquake
description: All models within 3" must pass Initiative tests or suffer D3 S4 hits from ground rupture.

name: Pool of Shadow
description: The area surrounding the mage is filled with twisting shadows, making it nearly impossible to see inside. Grants hiding and cover to nearby allies.

name: The Living Shadows
description: Shadows around the target writhe and move to strike the victim. Delivers a S4 hit without armour protection to enemies near walls.

name: Wings of Night
description: Wings of darkness unfurl from the Shadow Weaver's back. Teleports the caster up to 12" between walls, potentially initiating combat.

name: Cloak of Darkness
description: The Shadow Weaver appears to be swallowed by shadows. Conceals the caster from enemy targeting unless attacking.

name: Shadowbind
description: Tendrils of darkness rise from the shadows to engulf an enemy warrior. Immobilizes distant targets near walls until the caster casts again.

name: Shield of Shadow
description: Shadows congeal and become a solid barrier. Grants a 5+ armour save unaffected by attacker strength to the caster or nearby warband members.

name: Delicious Suffering
description: All models (friend and foe, except the Seer) within 3" must pass a Ld test or are knocked down.

name: Dance of the Serpent
description: Enemy models suffer a -1 penalty to hit the Seer in close combat until the beginning of his next shooting phase.

name: Endless Torment
description: Target enemy within 8" rolls for injury with -1 modifier after recovery; Seer becomes vulnerable while maintaining the spell.

name: Mystify
description: Target enemy within 8" has Initiative reduced to 1 and always strikes last in combat until passing a Ld test.

name: A Thousand Voices
description: Target enemy within 12" reduces Leadership by D3+1 (minimum 2) if not psychology-immune; lasts until they pass a Ld test.

name: Shornaal's Temptation
description: Target enemy within 8" must pass a Ld test or comes under the Seer's control; opponent can attempt to regain control each turn.

name: Tchar's Blessing
description: Pre-battle ritual granting experience points if the Seer survives, but prevents spellcasting that game.

name: Dispel Magic
description: The winds of magic are bound to the will of Tchar. Terminates all active spell effects.

name: Foresight
description: Pre-battle spell forcing one random enemy Hero to miss the next game. Casters are immune.

name: Wrath of the Great Eagle
description: Targets enemy within 12"; deals Strength damage based on Experience difference (max 10).

name: Tchar's Reward
description: Grants +1 to one stat per 10 Experience points; lasts until end of next shooting phase.

name: Slave to Chaos
description: 12" range; S2 hit with no armour save; killed models become Horrors of Tzeentch until game end.
